services-covered-before-deductible: No (none; must meet deductible first):contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}

services-covered-before-deductible: Yes – preventive care covered at 100% in-network:contentReference[oaicite:14]{index=14}

services-covered-before-deductible: Not applicable (deductible is $0):contentReference[oaicite:29]{index=29}

out-of-pocket-limit-hospital-surgery-com: Combined in overall limit (no separate hospital cap)

services-covered-before-deductible: N/A (no deductible to meet):contentReference[oaicite:33]{index=33}

specific-service-deductible: No (deductible applies per illness/injury as above)
